parameters.query: SELECT id, telegram_user_id, username FROM users WHERE telegram_user_id = '{{ $json.telegram_user_id }}'

INSERT INTO ralph_stories (
  story_id,
  project_id,
  title,
  description,
  acceptance_criteria,
  status,
  priority,
  feedback_interaction_id,
  approval_status,
  proposal_text,
  feedback_type,
  created_at
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.story_id }}',
  {{ $json.project_id }},
  'Fix: {{ $json.feedback_type }}',
  '{{ $json.proposal.analysis }}\n\n{{ $json.proposal.proposed_fix }}',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.proposal.acceptance_criteria) }}',
  'pending_approval',
  {{ $json.proposal.priority }},
  '{{ $json.interaction_id }}',
  'pending_approval',
  '{{ $json.proposal.proposed_fix }}',
  '{{ $json.feedback_type }}',
  NOW()
)
RETURNING id;

UPDATE interactions
SET story_id = '{{ $('Parse Claude Response').first().json.story_id }}',
    outcome = 'proposal_generated'
WHERE id = '{{ $('Parse Claude Response').first().json.interaction_id }}';
